data.title: British Military Medals Order of Wear
data.meta_description: As announced by the Central Chancery of the Orders of Knighthood, the order in which decorations and medals should be worn in the United Kingdom and the Commonwealth Victoria Cross George Cross ORDERS OF KNIGHTHOOD Most Noble Order of the Garter Most Ancient and Most Noble Order of the Thistle Most Illustrious Order of

"Overseas Territories…."
